rooms.description: Modern spacious living room with large floor-to-ceiling windows facing the garden for ample natural light and ventilation. Vastu principles ensure alignment with east-west axis.
Open plan dining area integrated with the kitchen, featuring modern finishes and glass partitions allowing views of the garden.
Fully equipped modern kitchen with state-of-the-art appliances. Incorporates energy-efficient design elements and floor-to-ceiling windows for natural lighting.
Spacious master bedroom with an en-suite bathroom and walk-in closet, oriented towards the garden according to Vastu principles.
Comfortable secondary bedroom positioned in a north-east corner per Vastu, ensuring tranquility.
Additional bedroom with integrated storage, designed for maximum space utilization while maintaining privacy.
Guest room with flexible design options to serve as an office or guest suite, aligned with Vastu guidelines.

openings.description: Modern entrance door integrated into the facade for secure access and aesthetic appeal.
Secondary entrance providing access to the garden and backyard area.
Floor-to-ceiling windows installed throughout the house, ensuring abundant natural light and adherence to modern design aesthetics.

garden_area.features: Expansive garden with landscaping, seating areas, water features, and an outdoor living space connecting to the open plan living area. Vastu principles ensure harmonious energy flow from nature into the house.

facade_elements.description: Sleek modern facade with integrated glass panels and minimalistic design elements that complement the overall aesthetic of a single-story 6BHK house on an 80x100 feet plot.
